title: The.Sims.4.Get.Together.Addon-RELOADED
description:
nERv

The Sims 4: Get Together (c) Electronic Arts

12/2015 :..... RELEASE.DATE .. PROTECTION .......: Origin + DLC hell
1 :.......... DISC(S) .. GAME.TYPE ........: Sims

Note:

This addon release includes all previous updates and DLC. Only the main game
is required. The previously unreleased DLC 'Spooky Stuff' DLC has been
included as a bonus.

--

Welcome to the beautiful new world of Windenburg, with picturesque landmarks
to explore like the sprawling hedge maze at the garden chateau, alluring
pools along the bluffs, and the mysterious ancient ruins. Visit local
hotspots and grab a delicious espresso at the cafe, chat up your favourite
crush at the pub, or dance the night away at the discotheque. Get together
with other Sims for exciting group activities like thrilling games of
foosball, lively midnight bonfires, super-secret dance parties, and more!
You can also join different clubs with distinct personalities and style, to
meet new Sims and live it up. In The Sims 4 Get Together* there's always a
great reason to get together.

1. Unrar.
2. Burn or mount the image.
3. Install the addon. Required: The.Sims.4-RELOADED
4. Copy over the cracked content from the /Crack directory on the image to
your game install directory.
5. Play the game.
6. Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
